movies.title: Zootopia 2
movies.about: Get ready to race back into the wild, colorful world of Zootopia, where animals talk, hustle, and chase their dreams - just like us!Whether you loved the first Zootopia or are diving in for the first time, this is one ride you don't want to miss!

movies.title: EKo
movies.about: In the misty hills of Kaattukunnu, Mlaathi Chedathi and Peeyoos struggle to survive unforeseen challenges as the chronicles of Kuriyachan, a multifaceted businessman and outlaw, blur the line between myth, longing, and reckoning, revealing that he forever rules the hills.

movies.title: Tere Ishk Mein
movies.about: Some souls are meant to collide. Some love stories are destined to burn brighter..

movies.title: Vilayath Budha
movies.about: A battle between a teacher and disciple over a valuable sandalwood tree.

movies.title: Revolver Rita
movies.about: Rita's quiet life in Pondicherry turns chaotic when her family becomes entangled in a violent gang war. With her sharp mind and courage, she must outwit the gangsters to keep her loved ones safe

movies.title: Kalamkaval
movies.about: A routine Kerala Police inquiry in the quiet village of Kottayikonam takes an unexpected turn when a trail of seemingly minor clues unravels a series of disturbing

movies.title: Mastii 4
movies.about: Three frustrated husbands seek freedom from their dull marriages. A wild idea promises escape and excitement. But what follows is anything but expected.

movies.title: De De Pyaar De 2
movies.about: In De De Pyaar De 2, love faces its toughest test yet as Ashish visits Ayesha's family home! Will the age-gap romance win hearts or stir things up? With heart, humour, and a whole lot of family madness, the Pyaar vs. Parivaar clash promises a relatable, riotous ride for every kind of audience.
